mapper.select:
select
from sal_chance_t where 1=1
and chc_create_date >= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{beginDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and chc_create_date <= FROM_UNIXTIME(#{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
